name: You Got Listings
headline: All-in-one apartment Marketing Platform for brokerages and landlords.
description: You Got Listings is an all-in-one apartment Marketing Platform for brokerages and management companies. Founded in 2009, You Got Listings through innovation and automation has helped push over 3 Million properties in front of prospect renters. We are here to provide the rentals industry with the most comprehensive online marketing solution.

raw_markdown="[ ![](https://www.yougotlistings.com/assets/v2/img/header_logo.png) ](http://www.yougotlistings.com/<https:/www.yougotlistings.com>)

Smart Advertising For Your Apartment Listings 
YouGotListings offers powerful apartment marketing software and services for brokerages & property managers. 
[Sign up](http://www.yougotlistings.com/<https:/www.yougotlistings.com/pricing>)
What YouGotListings Offers? 
Premium Syndication
Both free & paid listing syndication for all mainstream websites like Zillow, Zumper, Apartments.com in one place. 
Ad Posting Automation
Ad posting automation to websites requiring manual entry like Craigslist and Facebook Marketplace for complete coverage. 
Managed Marketing
Fully managed marketing and advertising services to help you increase exposure and reduce costs. 
Open Listings Network
Share your listings to local brokers at no cost. Access open listings in the local market to build your rentals inventory. 
Market Intelligence
Analytics to measure your marketing return. Intelligent reports to help you stay competitively priced. 
Rentals Software
Rentals inventory management, data entry service, CRM, API and more. Everything you need to run your whole marketing department. 
![](https://www.yougotlistings.com/assets/v2/img/homepage/about_img.jpg)
Who is YouGotListings for?
![](https://www.yougotlistings.com/assets/v2/img/homepage/plans_icon_landlord.png)
Landlords
Market your apartment listings to rent out your units **faster** and for **more**. 
[SIGN UP](http://www.yougotlistings.com/<https:/www.yougotlistings.com/pricing>)
![](https://www.yougotlistings.com/assets/v2/img/homepage/plans_icon_office.png)
Offices
The listings coverage and advertising tools you need to **empower** your agents. 
[SIGN UP](http://www.yougotlistings.com/<https:/www.yougotlistings.com/pricing>)
![](https://www.yougotlistings.com/assets/v2/img/homepage/plans_icon_agent.png)
Agents
Everything you need to run a **profitable** one-person rental business. 
[SIGN UP](http://www.yougotlistings.com/<https:/www.yougotlistings.com/pricing>)
Smart Advertising to increase exposure 
Advertise your listings effectively by combining free and premium listings syndication, ad posting automation, local broker network and marketing intelligence reports. You can even offload everything to us. 
  * Free Listings Syndication
  * Premium Listings Placement
  * Ad Posting Automation


  * Market Analysis
  * Local Brokers Network
  * Lead Capture & CRM


![](https://www.yougotlistings.com/assets/v2/img/homepage/feature_listings.jpg)
![](https://www.yougotlistings.com/assets/v2/img/homepage/feature_adv.jpg)
Open Listings Network for Brokers & Landlords 
Access open listings from landlords in your local area to get additional inventory. Share listings with local agents and brokerages for maximum exposure. 
  * Thousands of listings
  * MLS integration
  * Full data entry service


  * Sophisticated database system
  * Powerful data entry tools
  * Legacy-system data sync


Everything Needed for Your Marketing Department 
The best in class rentals software in one package. You can run your whole marketing department and rentals brokerage on the YouGotListings system. 
  * Website listings integration
  * API & developer tools
  * Enterprise-level websites


  * Credit Reports
  * Website/app development services
  * Free initial consultation


![](https://www.yougotlistings.com/assets/v2/img/homepage/feature_clients.jpg)
Ready to take your rental operation to the next level? 
[Sign up now](http://www.yougotlistings.com/<https:/www.yougotlistings.com/pricing>) [Ask a question](http://www.yougotlistings.com/<https:/www.yougotlistings.com/contact>)

generated_description:
**You Got Listings** is an all-in-one marketing platform tailored specifically for the rental industry, connecting brokerages and landlords to potential renters. Founded in 2009 and part of Y Combinator's W11 batch, this innovative platform has successfully marketed over 3 million properties. Based in an undisclosed location, the company comprises a tight-knit team of three dedicated employees, with a mission to provide the most comprehensive online marketing solutions for the rentals sector. 

At its core, You Got Listings helps real estate professionals—whether they're brokerages, property managers, or individual agents—streamline their marketing efforts through a suite of powerful tools. These offerings encompass premium syndication (both free and paid), ad posting automation to platforms like Craigslist and Facebook Marketplace, and fully managed marketing services. The Open Listings Network allows users to share inventory with local brokers, enhancing exposure and collaboration in the market.

Their product suite not only captures and automates listings but also provides market intelligence—analytics that offer insights into pricing and marketing effectiveness. For agencies looking to bolster their operations, You Got Listings also delivers a comprehensive set of software tools, including CRM solutions and data management systems, to run the entire marketing department efficiently.

Who benefits from this? Landlords can rent out their units faster; brokerages empower their agents with sophisticated advertising tools; and solo agents gain a profitable footing in the rental market with everything they need in one package.

If you're in the rental business and seeking a smarter way to market, You Got Listings might just be the solution you need. Visit their website [here](http://www.yougotlistings.com) to explore their services or sign up.
